			if(i)

		}
		dp[0] = 0;
		FOR(i,1,N)
			dp[i] = pref[i-1];
		FOR(i,2,N)
			FOR(j,1,i)
				dp[i] = min(dp[i], dp[j]+DIST(j-1,i)+pref[i-1]-pref[j]);
		ans = INF;
		FOR(i,1,N)
			ans = min(ans, dp[i]+pref[N-1]-pref[i]);
